languages.text: {n}Офицер с достоинством склоняет голову. Вы замечаете свежие пятна масла на его мундире — очевидно, он не ограничился тем, чтобы послать подчиненных, но и проводил осмотр контура склепа лично.{/n}
{n}The officer bows his head with dignity. You notice fresh oil stains on his coat — it seems he not only sent his underlings, but also went to investigate the area himself.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Офицер с достоинством склоняет голову. Вы замечаете свежие пятна масла на его мундире — очевидно, он не ограничился тем, чтобы послать подчиненных, но и проводил осмотр контура склепа лично.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The officer bows his head with dignity. You notice fresh oil stains on his coat — it seems he did not stop at sending his underlings, he also went to investigate the area himself.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'officier incline la tête avec dignité. Vous remarquez de nouvelles taches d'huile sur sa veste, preuve qu'il ne s'est pas contenté d'envoyer ses subalternes inspecter la zone.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer bows his head with dignity. You notice fresh oil stains on his coat — it seems he not only sent his underlings, but also went to investigate the area himself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'officier incline la tête avec dignité. Vous remarquez de nouvelles taches d'huile sur sa veste, preuve qu'il ne s'est pas contenté d'envoyer ses subalternes inspecter la zone.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El oficial inclina la cabeza con dignidad. Te fijas en las manchas de aceite frescas de su abrigo: parece que no solo ha enviado a sus subalternos, sino que también ha investigado la zona en persona.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer bows his head with dignity. You notice fresh oil stains on his coat — it seems he not only sent his underlings, but also went to investigate the area himself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El oficial inclina la cabeza con dignidad. Te fijas en las manchas de aceite frescas de su abrigo: parece que no solo ha enviado a sus subalternos, sino que también ha investigado la zona en persona.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这位军官充满威严地低下了头。你注意到他的外套沾上了新的油渍，看来他不仅派来了下属，还亲自调查了这片区域。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer bows his head with dignity. You notice fresh oil stains on his coat — it seems he not only sent his underlings, but also went to investigate the area himself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这位军官充满威严地低下了头。你注意到他的外套沾上了新的油渍，看来他不仅派来了下属，还亲自调查了这片区域。{/n}

languages.text: {n}警官は堂々と頭を下げた。コートにはついたばかりのオイルの染みがあった。どうやら、彼は部下を送っただけでなく、自らもこの地域を調査しに行ったようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer bows his head with dignity. You notice fresh oil stains on his coat — it seems he not only sent his underlings, but also went to investigate the area himself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}警官は堂々と頭を下げた。コートにはついたばかりのオイルの染みがあった。どうやら、彼は部下を送っただけでなく、自らもこの地域を調査しに行ったようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Offizier senkt würdevoll den Kopf. Du bemerkst frische Ölflecken auf seinem Mantel. Offenbar hat er nicht nur seine Untergebenen geschickt, sondern sich auch selbst umgesehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer bows his head with dignity. You notice fresh oil stains on his coat — it seems he not only sent his underlings, but also went to investigate the area himself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Offizier senkt würdevoll den Kopf. Du bemerkst frische Ölflecken auf seinem Mantel. Offenbar hat er nicht nur seine Untergebenen geschickt, sondern sich auch selbst umgesehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Subay, ağırbaşlılıkla başını eğiyor. Ceketindeki taze yağ lekelerini fark ediyorsun. Belli ki yalnızca adamlarını göndermekle kalmamış, aynı zamanda kendisi de bölgeyi incelemeye gitmiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer bows his head with dignity. You notice fresh oil stains on his coat — it seems he not only sent his underlings, but also went to investigate the area himself.{/n}
